price: Nokorε sε, Yɛbɛbisa wͻn a Yεsomaa (asomafoͻ) kͻͻ wͻn hͻ no asεm, na Yɛbɛbisa asomafoͻ no nso asεm.
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falanasalanna alladhīna ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salīna
